sources.title: The Black Arrow 1948 colorized (Louis Hayward)
sources.description: A young nobleman (Louis Hayward) returns from the War of the Roses to find his father murdered, a fugitive family friend blamed, and his uncle (George Macready) occupying his estates. He joins forces with a fugitive heiress (Janet Blair) and an outlaw (Edgar Buchanan). Based on the 1888 novel by Robert Louis Stevenson. I hope you enjoy my colorization of this classic film.
